thread.title: BRIEF-DowDuPont Announces Brand Names For Companies It Intends to Create

title: BRIEF-DowDuPont Announces Brand Names For Companies It Intends to Create
text: 32 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-DowDuPont Announces Brand Names For Companies It Intends to Create   DowDuPont Inc: * DOWDUPONT ANNOUNCES BRAND NAMES FOR THE THREE INDEPENDENT COMPANIES IT INTENDS TO CREATE, REFLECTING ONGOING PROGRESS TOWARDS SEPARATIONS * AGRICULTURE DIVISION TO BE CORTEVA AGRISCIENCE * MATERIALS SCIENCE DIVISION WILL BE CALLED DOW, AND WILL RETAIN DOW DIAMOND AS ITS BRAND​ * ‍SPECIALTY PRODUCTS DIVISION TO BE NEW DUPONT​ * WHILE SOME PRODUCT NAMES WILL CHANGE AT SEPARATION, MANY PRODUCTS WITHIN EACH INTENDED CO TO CONTINUE BE SOLD UNDER CURRENT BRAND NAMES * ‍ADDITIONAL BRAND DEVELOPMENT WORK FOR INTENDED MATERIALS SCIENCE CO AND INTENDED SPECIALTY PRODUCTS CO IS ONGOING​ * ‍MATERIALS SCIENCE ANTICIPATED TO SEPARATE BY END OF Q1 2019; AGRICULTURE & SPECIALTY PRODUCTS EXPECTED TO SEPARATE BY JUNE 1, 2019​
